name: HealthcareService
title: HealthcareService
description: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

elements.name: HealthcareService
elements.description: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: External identifiers for this item.

elements.name: active
elements.description: This flag is used to mark the record to not be used. This is not used when a centre is closed for maintenance, or for holidays, the notAvailable period is to be used for this.

elements.name: providedBy
elements.description: The organization that provides this healthcare service.

elements.name: category
elements.description: Identifies the broad category of service being performed or delivered.

elements.name: type
elements.description: The specific type of service that may be delivered or performed.

elements.name: specialty
elements.description: Collection of specialties handled by the service site. This is more of a medical term.

elements.name: location
elements.description: The location(s) where this healthcare service may be provided.

elements.name: name
elements.description: Further description of the service as it would be presented to a consumer while searching.

elements.name: comment
elements.description: Any additional description of the service and/or any specific issues not covered by the other attributes, which can be displayed as further detail under the serviceName.

elements.name: extraDetails
elements.description: Extra details about the service that can't be placed in the other fields.

elements.name: photo
elements.description: If there is a photo/symbol associated with this HealthcareService, it may be included here to facilitate quick identification of the service in a list.

elements.name: telecom
elements.description: List of contacts related to this specific healthcare service.

elements.name: coverageArea
elements.description: The location(s) that this service is available to (not where the service is provided).

elements.name: serviceProvisionCode
elements.description: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

elements.name: eligibility
elements.description: Does this service have specific eligibility requirements that need to be met in order to use the service?

elements.name: program
elements.description: Programs that this service is applicable to.

elements.name: characteristic
elements.description: Collection of characteristics (attributes).

elements.name: communication
elements.description: Some services are specifically made available in multiple languages, this property permits a directory to declare the languages this is offered in.

elements.name: referralMethod
elements.description: Ways that the service accepts referrals, if this is not provided then it is implied that no referral is required.

elements.name: appointmentRequired
elements.description: Indicates whether or not a prospective consumer will require an appointment for a particular service at a site to be provided by the Organization.

elements.name: availableTime
elements.description: A collection of times that the Service Site is available.

elements.name: notAvailable
elements.description: The HealthcareService is not available during this period of time due to the provided reason.

elements.name: availabilityExceptions
elements.description: A description of site availability exceptions, e.g. public holiday availability.

elements.name: endpoint
elements.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the specific healthcare services defined at this resource.
